alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Jay; Wells; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 12:54PM EDT until April 05 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Allen County in northeastern Indiana... Eastern Grant County in central Indiana... Southeastern Whitley County in northeastern Indiana... Blackford County in east central Indiana... Huntington County in northeastern Indiana... Wells County in northeastern Indiana... Adams County in northeastern Indiana... Jay County in east central Indiana... * Until 145 PM EDT. * At 1254 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Markle to Alexandria, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, Marion, Huntington, New Haven, Bluffton, Decatur, Portland, Hartford City, Gas City, Berne, Upland, Ossian, Fairmount, Dunkirk, Montpelier, Jonesboro, Woodburn, Redkey, Geneva and Monroeville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 0 and 23. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 253 and 306. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for central, northeastern and east central Indiana...and west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant property damage.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Allen; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Jay; Wells; Whitley
